description:
OverviewThis flexible Adapter connects the DisplayPort socket of your PC / Graphics Card 
to the HDMI cable of your Monitor, HDTV, or Projector (HDMI cable is not 
included). It supports DisplayPort++ that can transmit DVI and HDMI signals. 
This passive Adapter supports up to a 2-Monitor configuration with AMD Eyefinity 
Multi-Display technology. An active Adapter is required to support more 
Monitors.Instructions1. Connect the Adapter to 
the DisplayPort source of your device and to the HDMI cable of your Display (HDMI 
cable is not included)2. Select Extension or Mirror Mode in Control Panel > DisplayTechnical Specifications* HDCP compliant* Supports DisplayPort v1.2 and HDMI v1.3* Supports HDMI 225MHz/2.25Gbps per channel bandwidth* Supports resolutions up to 1080p with audio* Supports uncompressed digital audio LPCM 7.1, 5.1* RoHS compliant* Input: DisplayPort (Male)* Output: HDMI (Female)Important Notes* This Adapter is NOT bi-directional. It only operates from DP to HDMI).* This is NOT a USB or Mini-DisplayPort to HDMI Adapter.* This is a passive adapter that requires a DP++ port (check your PC port)* Depress the DisplayPort latch when disconnecting to release the lock and avoid 
damage.
title: Cable Matters - Gold-Plated DisplayPort to HDMI Adapter (Male to Female) with Audio in Black
